headline: FTC Approves Omnicom’s $13.5 Billion Acquisition of The Interpublic Group of Companies (IPG)
summary: The Interpublic Group of Companies, Inc. (NYSE:IPG) is one of the 13 Cheap Mid-Cap Stocks to Add to Your Portfolio. On June 23, The Interpublic Group of Companies, Inc. (NYSE:IPG) reported that the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) approved Omnicom Group’s $13.5 billion acquisition of IPG. The acquisition would result in the combination of two of the […]
